name: Nothingness (PhillSerrazina)
description:
Nothingness was a game made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 45 with the theme "Start With Nothing"!

The only control of the game is the left mouse button, so sit back, grab a cuppa and enjoy this relaxing experience!

WARNING: The browser version may be unstable, downloading the Windows version is recommended for a better experience!
